text: Paul O'Neill (February 23, 1956 â€“ April 5, 2017) was an American music composer, songwriter and producer. O'Neill's death was announced in a brief note posted on the Trans-Siberian Orchestra website on April 5, 2017, which cited chronic illness. ==Trans-Siberian Orchestra== * 1996 - Christmas Eve and Other Stories * 1998 - The Christmas Attic * 2000 - Beethoven's Last Night * 2004 - The Lost Christmas Eve * 2009 - Night Castle * 2012 - Beethoven's Last Night - The Complete Narrated Version * 2012 - Dreams of Fireflies (On a Christmas Night) - EP * 2015 - Letters From the Labyrinth ==References== Category:1956 births Category:2017 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in Florida Category:American songwriters Category:American composers Category:Writers from New York City
title: Paul O'Neill
